subject: Re: Validating xml
msgSnippet: ... Why not just create a DTD or XML Schema for your documents, and use a validating parser?  What might be the reasons to do something more complicated than
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
> moe_morten wrote:
>>> I want to test that I get a valid result from a webservice call. I
>>> guess this involves validating the xml? Any tips on a good way to do
>>> this?
>
>
> XMLUnit. You'll also want to get to know the XPath API.
> -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603 Let's write software that people understand

Why not just create a DTD or XML Schema for your documents, and use a validating
parser? What might be the reasons to do something more complicated than this?

Thanks,
Chad
